Articles.Content:
Want to test your asteroid capture rig's capabilities before you've gotten to the asteroid? Now you can!

This pack of .craft files includes simulated asteroid sizes for all of the most common weights: 20T, 50T, 100T, 250T, 550T, 1000T, 2000T, and of course, 3000T. By using a mod such as Kerbal Engineer Redux, you can measure how well your planned asteroid catcher will fare with your target asteroid.

Download: Simulated Asteroid Craft Pack
